arts.ttl: All 10 Premier League weekend games predictions - Week 5
arts.sum: The Premier League is back on Saturday and Sunday after the excitement of the midweek Champions League action and Phil Agius provides a score prediction for all 10 top-flight matches in England.

arts.ttl: West Ham vs Crystal Palace predictions: Eagles can swoop for the win
arts.sum: Crystal Palace are unbeaten in the Premier League this season and Aaron Ashley expects them to keep that record intact when they make the short trip to West Ham.

arts.ttl: Potter under real pressure as West Ham owners expect reaction vs Palace
arts.sum: Graham Potter is under real pressure as West Ham United head coach heading into Saturday's home game against Crystal Palace.

arts.ttl: West Ham vs. Crystal Palace: Head-to-head record and past meetings
arts.sum: Sports Mole looks at the head-to-head record and previous meetings between West Ham United and Crystal Palace.

arts.ttl: Who replaces Soucek? West Ham predicted XI vs. Crystal Palace
arts.sum: Sports Mole looks at how West Ham United could line up for Saturday's Premier League match with Crystal Palace at the London Stadium.

arts.ttl: Continuity is key: Crystal Palace predicted XI vs. West Ham
arts.sum: Sports Mole looks at how Crystal Palace could line up for their match in the Premier League at West Ham United on Saturday afternoon.
